issue.title: [C++] Fix compilation error in dataset expressions on macOS 10.11
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11277](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11277). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See https://github.com/autobrew/homebrew-core/pull/61#issuecomment-761605455

R binary packages for macOS are built with an old SDK, so this is needed.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11277?focusedCommentId=17268247) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9267
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9267>
